chapter.title: Java Interaction
chapter.para: &SISC; can be used as a scripting language for Java, or Java may be used to provide functionality to Scheme. Such activity is collectively termed 'bridging'. &SISC; provides an API that may be called from Java to execute Scheme code or evaluate Scheme expressions. In addition, the J2S module provides Scheme level control of Java objects, methods, and fields. Finally, the two can be combined in a number of complex ways to intertwine the two languages.
